CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), aps.PLAN_DT, 112) = #CALENDAR_DT#

select a.ccd as value, b.title as label from asz170 a join bca200v b on a.ccd = b.base_cd where itm_gubun = #ITM_GUBUN# and pcd = #LVALUE#

sqlMap.select:
SELECT cs_no from asa010 where
mbr_di = (SELECT MBR_DI from ASW_M_MBR_LOGIN WHERE MBR_ID = #MBR_ID#)
mbr_di = #MBR_DI#
SELECT isnull(max(seq+1),1) as seq from asa050 where cs_no = #csNo#
SELECT a.CS_TIME_SEQ, a.CS_TIME_VALUE, a.CS_TIME_TP FROM ASW_CS_TIME_TABLE a ORDER BY CS_TIME_ORDER

SELECT a.CS_TIME_SEQ, a.CS_TIME_VALUE, case when a.CS_TIME_LIMIT > count(b.CS_TIME_SEQ) then 'Y' else 'N' END as CS_TIME_LIMIT FROM ASW_CS_TIME_TABLE a LEFT JOIN ASW_CS_MST b ON a.CS_TIME_SEQ = b.CS_TIME_SEQ and CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), b.BOOKING_DT, 120) = #BOOKING_DT# and b.STAT_BC <> 'AS204900' GROUP BY a.CS_TIME_SEQ, a.CS_TIME_VALUE, a.CS_TIME_LIMIT

SELECT a.AS_TEMP_NO, a.AS_NO, case when (select count(*) from ASW_M_MBR_LOGIN where MBR_DI = (SELECT mbr_di FROM asa010 WHERE CS_NO = a.CS_NO)) = 1 then '회원' else '비회원'end as MBR_TP, a.CS_NO, a.MODEL, a.ASCODE_LEV1, a.ASCODE_LEV2, a.COMMENT, a.ITM_GUBUN, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.BOOKING_DT, 120) as BOOKING_DT, a.STAT_BC, a.INP_BC, a.MODEL_ITEM_CD, a.CS_TIME_SEQ, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REG_DT, 120) as REG_DT, case when a.CS_TYPE = 'TEL' then '전화상담' else '출장서비스' end as CS_TYPE_NM, (select CS_TIME_VALUE from ASW_CS_TIME_TABLE where CS_TIME_SEQ = a.CS_TIME_SEQ) as CS_TIME_VALUE, a.CS_NM as T_NM, a.HP as T_HP, a.TEL as T_TEL, a.ZIP_CD as T_ZIP_CD, a.ADDR as T_ADDR, a.ADDR2 as T_ADDR2, a.RE_AREA, a.AS_ADV, a.OEM_BC, a.CUST_CD, a.OEM_BC, a.REJECT_MSG
FROM ASW_CS_MST a WHERE a.AS_TEMP_NO = #AS_TEMP_NO#

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.REG_DT desc ) AS NUM, a.AS_TEMP_NO, a.AS_NO, a.CS_NO, a.ITM_GUBUN, a.MODEL, (select top 1 bb.spec from asz200 aa join dma100 bb on aa.itm_pid = bb.itm_id where aa.itm_pid = a.MODEL) as MODEL_NM, (select count(*) from ASW_CS_MST where CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), REG_DT, 120) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REG_DT, 120) and CS_NO = a.CS_NO and CS_TYPE = a.CS_TYPE) as AS_DAY_COUNT, (select top 1 title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.ASCODE_LEV1) +' > '+ (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.ASCODE_LEV2) as ASCODE_NM, a.CS_TIME_SEQ, a.COMMENT, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.BOOKING_DT, 120) as BOOKING_DT, case when a.STAT_BC = '0' then '처리대기' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204100' then '접수' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204200' then '수리진행' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204300' then '수리완료' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204400' then '정산' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204800' then '상담처리'end as STATUS, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REG_DT, 120) as REG_DT, case when a.CS_TYPE = 'TEL' then '전화상담' else '출장서비스' end as CS_TYPE_NM, (select CS_TIME_VALUE from ASW_CS_TIME_TABLE where CS_TIME_SEQ = a.CS_TIME_SEQ) as CS_TIME_VALUE, case when a.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '0' then '비데' when a.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '1' then '위생도기' when a.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '2' then '수전' when a.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '3' then '블렌더' when a.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '4' then '이누스바스' end as PROD_NM, a.CS_NM as T_NM, a.HP as T_HP, a.TEL as T_TEL, case when (select count(*) from ASW_M_MBR_LOGIN where MBR_DI = (SELECT b.mbr_di from asa010 b where b.cs_no = a.cs_no ) ) > 0 then '회원' else '비회원' end as CS_TP, a.ZIP_CD +' '+ a.ADDR +' ' +isnull(a.ADDR2,'') as T_ADDR_NM
FROM ASW_CS_MST a WHERE a.CS_TYPE = #CS_TYPE#
a.MODEL_ITEM_CD = #MODEL_ITEM_CD#
a.STAT_BC = #STAT_BC#
a.CS_NM like '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
REPLACE(a.HP,'-','') like '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT#,'-','') +'%'
a.ZIP_CD +' '+ a.ADDR +' ' +isnull(a.ADDR2,'') like '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REG_DT, 120) >= #TXT_FROM_DT#
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REG_DT, 120) <= #TXT_TO_DT#
) x ORDER BY x.NUM ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM ASW_CS_MST a WHERE a.CS_NO = (SELECT cs_no FROM asa010 WHERE mbr_di = ( SELECT MBR_DI FROM ASW_M_MBR_LOGIN WHERE MBR_ID = #MBR_ID# ) )
select a.itm_pid as value, b.itm_cd, isnull(b.spec ,'') as label, b.um_bc from asz200 a join dma100 b on a.itm_pid = b.itm_id where 1=1 and a.itm_gubun = #ITM_GUBUN# order by b.itm_cd
select b.itm_cd, isnull(b.itm_nm ,'') as itm_nm from asz200 a join dma100 b on a.itm_pid = b.itm_id where 1=1 and a.itm_gubun = #ITM_GUBUN# and a.itm_pid = #MODEL#

select DISTINCT a.cust_cd as value, a.cust_nm as label from bcv100 a , ASW_AUTO_RECEIPT b where 1=1 and a.cust_cd = b.cust_cd and ( a.cust_cd = 'y' or a.cust_bc = 'BC500500' ) /* and a.cust_cd = 'h21353'*/ /*임시*/ order by a.cust_nm

SELECT a.AS_TEMP_NO , a.ATTCH_CD , b.ATTCH_FILE_NM AS ATTCH_FILE_NM , b.ATTCH_FILE_PATH AS ATTCH_FILE_PATH , b.ATTCH_REAL_ABSOLUTE_PATH AS ATTCH_REAL_ABSOLUTE_PATH , b.ATTCH_ID FROM ASW_CS_ATTCH a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ASW_G_ATTCH b ON b.ATTCH_CD = a.ATTCH_CD WHERE a.AS_TEMP_NO = #AS_TEMP_NO#

select base_cd as value, title as label from bca200v where main_cd ='SDH08' and use_yn ='1'
and base_cd = #ITM_GUBUN#
select top 1 drv_nm, hp from Asz130 where top_yn = '1' and cust_cd = #custCd#
